definitions.definition: a floor covering of thick woven material or animal skin, typically not extending over the entire floor.
examples: mat, carpet, runner; Morehearth rug, floor cloth "they sat on the rug"Morehearth rug, floor cloth they sat on the rug

definitions.definition: a thick woolen coverlet or wrap, used especially when traveling.

examples: toupee, wig, hairpiece who is he trying to fool with that rug?
